svg.text: Oga Driver Platform - Database Tables Specification
5. DRIVER_APPLICATION - Driver applications for vehicles with status tracking
8. FINANCIAL_REPORT - Monthly financial reports for vehicle owners
10. ACTIVITY_LOG - User activity tracking and audit trail
12. VEHICLE_MAINTENANCE - Vehicle maintenance records and scheduling
Variable character string with maximum length n
Decimal number with m total digits and d decimal places
Large text field for longer content
